author: Heather Haddon
title: McDonald’s Sales Soften, Sounding Alarm for Restaurants as Diners Curb Visits
description: The fast-food giant said it is focusing on value with consumers continuing to tighten their budgets.
content:
McDonalds kicked off a string of quarterly reports from U.S. restaurant chains this week. - jaimi joy/Reuters
McDonalds said its sales last quarter sputtered as the burger giant grappled with consum… [+3987 chars]
